data.question: What is the chemical formula for CIAC-115?
What method was used for the dynamic light scattering measurement for CIAC-115?
What is the BET surface area of CIAC-116?
What is the Curie-Weiss law parameter theta (θ) for CIAC-115?
What is the main difference in the synthesis conditions between CIAC-115 and CIAC-116?
data.answer: CIAC-115 was synthesized using NiCl2·6H2O, while CIAC-116 was synthesized using CoCl2·6H2O under the same reaction conditions.

data.question: Is the gas adsorption behavior of CIAC-115 indicative of a microporous material?
Does CIAC-115 exhibit higher adsorption capacities for C2H6 and C3H8 compared to CH4?
Is the magnetic data for CIAC-116 indicative of ferromagnetic interactions between the metal centers?
What is the role of tetramethylammonium hydroxide in the synthesis of CIAC-115 and CIAC-116?
data.answer: It is used in the solvothermal reaction mixture for the synthesis of both CIAC-115 and CIAC-116.

data.question: What technique was used to determine the structure of CIAC-115 and CIAC-116?
Is the solvent used in the dynamic light scattering measurement for CIAC-115 dichloromethane?
What is the approximate size of the CIAC-115 cage as determined by dynamic light scattering?
Does the synthesis of CIAC-116 result in a one-dimensional bamboo stick-like coordination polymer?
What is the main geometric feature of the CIAC-115 structure?
data.answer: It is a hexadecahedron with a gyroelongated square bipyramidal geometry.

data.question: What is the symmetry space group of CIAC-115?
Is the gas selectivity of C3H8 over CH4 in CIAC-115 comparable with many examples reported?
What is the main difference in the crystal structure between CIAC-115 and CIAC-116?
data.answer: CIAC-115 forms a discrete hexadecahedral cage, while CIAC-116 forms a one-dimensional bamboo stick-like coordination polymer.

data.question: What is the role of 5-(pyridin-4-yl)isophthalate (PIP) ligands in the structure of CIAC-115?
data.answer: PIP ligands act as tiles linking Ni4-TC4A units to form the hexadecahedral cage.

data.question: Does the synthesis of CIAC-115 involve a one-pot solvothermal reaction?
What is the role of dynamic light scattering in the characterization of CIAC-115?
data.answer: It is used to verify the existence of the cage molecules in solution by measuring the average diameter.
